stringified:
Starts With | string,searchValue,fromIndex | value | IMPLICIT | NONE
({ string, searchValue, fromIndex }, { value }) =>
    value.next(string.startsWith(searchValue, fromIndex))

original.description: Determines whether a string begins with the characters of another string, returning true or false as appropriate
original.runFnString:
({ string, searchValue, fromIndex }, { value }) =>
    value.next(string.startsWith(searchValue, fromIndex))

alternativeFunction: function ({ inputString, searchValue, startIndex }, { result }) { result.next(inputString.startsWith(searchValue, startIndex)); }
alternativeMetaData: StartsWithCheck | inputString, searchValue, startIndex | result | IMPLICIT | NONE
